Regulation Name(s): Multiplex nucleic acid assay for identification of microorganisms and resistance markers from positive blood cultures
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for iCubate iC-GPC Assay, a multiplex PCR microarray assay on the iC-System for qualitative detection of specific gram positive bacteria and resistance markers directly from positive blood cultures.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative, multiplex in vitro diagnostic assay for the detection and identification of potentially pathogenic gram positive bacteria and resistance markers (mecA, vanA, vanB) directly from positive blood cultures confirmed by Gram stain to contain gram positive cocci, to aid in the diagnosis of bacterial bloodstream infections in conjunction with other clinical and laboratory findings; not for monitoring of infections.
